name: Yashar Ganjali
content: Home - Yashar Ganjali Yashar Ganjali Professor Systems and Networking Group Department of Computer Science at the University of Toronto Research My research focuses on computer networks in general, and data center networking, software defined networks, and congestion control. You can find an automatically generated list of my publications here. News 2025-05: Our paper received the best paper award at IFIP Networking 2025. Congratulations to Farid Zandi and Manya Ghobadi! 2024-08: Sepehr defended his PhD! Congratulations Dr. Abbasi Zadeh! 2024-08: NSDI'25 paper accepted. Congratulations to Matt, Parsa, and our wonderful collaborators at Google! â¦ see all news.
